영하의 날씨에는 옷을 따뜻하게 입으세요. (Dress warmly in sub-zero weather.)
실내 온도가 적당해요. (The indoor temperature is moderate.)
날씨가 너무 더워서 에어컨을 켰어요. (It was so hot that I turned on the air conditioner.)
겨울 바다는 아주 추워요. (The winter sea is very cold.)

vocabularyItems.meaning: To be humid and hot / sultry
vocabularyItems.example_sentence: 장마철이라 날씨가 아주 무더워요. (It's very sultry because it's the rainy season.)

liar_game_data.question: Which seasonal phenomenon in Korea involves yellowish dust originating from the deserts of Mongolia and China, typically occurring in Spring?
liar_game_data.explanation: Hwangsa (Yellow Dust) is a well-known seasonal occurrence in Korea during the spring. It consists of fine dust blown from dry regions in China and Mongolia, often requiring people to wear masks for health protection.
